summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Monday. Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 20 Bitcoin mining stocks rose on Monday.
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Monday, with 11 gaining and the other eight declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.6% to $27,927 by market close.
